en.title: Dominica Citizenship by Investment (CBI)
en.intro: In a world where freedom of movement and global opportunities are increasingly important, Citizenship by Investment (CBI) programs in the Caribbean offer you an exceptional opportunity to secure a more stable future for yourself and your family, with a powerful passport that opens the doors to the world.

overview.heading: Overview
overview.description: Dominica, the "Nature Isle of the Caribbean," is famous for its rainforests, volcanoes, and hot springs. Its economy relies on eco-tourism and agriculture, making it an ideal destination for nature lovers and sustainable investment.

why_choose.heading: Why Choose Dominica?
reasons: Oldest CBI Program: Operating since 1993, offering reliability and stability.
Low Cost: Competitive cost compared to other countries.
Powerful Passport: Grants entry to over 140 countries, including China.
Flexibility: A reliable and flexible program, ideal for families.

qualification_options.heading: Qualification Options
options: Donation to the Economic Diversification Fund (EDF).
Investment in an approved Real Estate project.
Contribution to alternative investment options approved by the government.

how_to_obtain.heading: How to Obtain Citizenship
how_to_obtain.description: Citizenship is granted through a streamlined process that includes applying via an authorized agent, selecting the preferred investment route, passing a rigorous due diligence check, and finally receiving citizenship.

en.processing_time: The application typically takes between 6 to 9 months, with expedited options available.
en.investment_requirement: Minimum investment starts from USD 200,000, or donation of USD 100,000.
en.key_benefits: Oldest and most affordable CBI program in the Caribbean, perfect for families seeking stability.
en.location_overview: Dominica is situated in the Eastern Caribbean, between Guadeloupe and Martinique.

visa_free_access.heading: Visa-Free Access with Dominica Passport
visa_free_access.description: Holders of this passport can travel without a visa to approximately 112 countries, including: All Schengen Area countries (Germany, Austria, Belgium, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland), United Kingdom, Ireland, Most Caribbean countries (Antigua & Barbuda, Saint Kitts & Nevis, Saint Lucia, Grenada, Barbados, Jamaica), South America (Brazil, Argentina, Chile, Colombia, Peru, Ecuador, Uruguay), Asia (Singapore, South Korea, Hong Kong, Malaysia, Philippines, Indonesia), Africa (South Africa, Morocco, Tunisia, Botswana, Mauritius, Seychelles), and more.

visa_on_arrival.heading: Visa on Arrival (Approx. 25 Countries)
visa_on_arrival.description: Available in countries such as: Nepal, Maldives, Cambodia, Laos, Kenya, Tanzania, Uganda, Madagascar, Zambia, Zimbabwe, Malawi, Togo, Marshall Islands, Palau, Micronesia, Vanuatu, Fiji, Samoa.

electronic_travel_authorization.heading: Electronic Travel Authorization (Approx. 3 Countries)
electronic_travel_authorization.description: Accessible for: Canada, Australia, New Zealand (eTA).

visa_required.heading: Visa Required Prior to Travel
visa_required.description: Entry is only permitted with a pre-approved visa for: United States, China (excluding Hong Kong and Macau), Russia, Most Middle Eastern countries (Syria, Iraq, Yemen, Libya, Algeria), Select African nations (Congo, Sudan, Eritrea), Several Central Asian countries (Turkmenistan, Afghanistan, North Korea).

evisa_required.heading: eVisa Required Before Travel (Approx. 8 Countries)
evisa_required.description: Includes: India, Sri Lanka, Turkey, Azerbaijan, Vietnam, Ethiopia, Bangladesh, Ivory Coast.

application_requirements.heading: Essential Application Requirements
application_requirements.intro: Before choosing the appropriate country, all applicants for Caribbean Citizenship by Investment programs must meet these general conditions:
requirements: Legal Age: The main applicant must be at least 18 years old.
Good Conduct and Character: The applicant must possess a good reputation and sound character.
Clean Criminal Record: Applicants with criminal records or pending cases are not accepted.
Good Health: The applicant must be in good health and free from serious infectious diseases.
Financial Capability: Proof of the legal and transparent source of funds.
Pass Due Diligence: All applicants undergo a meticulous security and financial screening to ensure credibility.
